bill.title: Condominiums; Association Meetings
bill.description: Requires that petitioners have adequate time to address concerns at a requested special association meeting. Prohibits an association from adopting any permanent rule for association meetings that limits or restrict discussion or debate. (SB2465 HD1)

history.action: (S) Introduced.
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to CPN.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-22-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.
(S) The committee(s) on CPN deferred the measure until 02-24-12 9:00AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Green, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria, Solomon, Slom.
(S) Reported from CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2485) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 191) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) Pass First Reading
(H) Referred to HSG, CPC, referral sheet 41
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 03-21-12 9:00AM in House conference room 325.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Ito, Chang, Coffman, Har, Kawakami, Nakashima, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Herkes, Pine.
(H) Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1291-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Herkes excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Thursday, 03-29-12 2:35PM in House conference room 325.
(H) The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
